description: Represents a textual detection done by policy.

end.description: The end position of the detection in the original data.
end.title: end

key.description: The key that is used in the name's place, If empty, a sequence of X's are used.
key.title: key

redacted.description: If true this detection has been redacted.
redacted.title: redacted

redactedEnd.description: The end position of the detection in the redacted data.
redactedEnd.title: redactedEnd

redactedStart.description: The start position of the detection in the redacted data.
redactedStart.title: redactedStart

score.description: The confidence score of the detection.
score.title: score

start.description: The start position of the detection in the original data.
start.title: start

title: TextualDetection
